comment: In a Moore system whose closure operator has the exchange property, if ` S ` is independent and contained in the closure of ` T ` , and either ` S ` or ` T ` is finite, then ` T ` dominates ` S ` . This is an immediate consequence of ~ mreexexd . (Contributed by David Moews, 1-May-2017.)
